::Battera:;

She looked at him with curiosity. "You didn't know I was a Predacon? 
Oh, well, I'm sorry to alarm you. I am Pred, but that doesn't make me 
a bad bot. I have been here for some time.   Rex and Firearm know who 
I am.  They gave me quarters and permission to stay until I have 
fulfilled my duties.  I am here to offically extend invitatoin to the 
maximal leader to our embacy for peace talks with the other leaders 
of other groups.  Weare trying to put an end to the war.  Not start 
one.  I am here on peaceful terms and shall remain so no matter what 
happens.  Wheather I am here with you or in the brig, I shall 
complete my mission and ask for peace."  She looked at him for a 
moment.  Now she felt a little worried,"You aren't going to put me in 
the brig are you? I have done nothing wrong." she looked at him with 
a little nervousness showing in her face.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster listens to Battera, his eyes narrowing at the 
word 'Predacon'. She 
> was a Predacon? On the bridge of the Maximal base? Kluster glances 
at a 
> computer console, a list of bots on the ship showing on it. Battera 
was a 
> Predacon.
> 
> "Our leader is Iron Raptor," Kluster says, his voice neutral, "Have 
you just 
> been wandering around the base like this?"
> 
> He would need to have a word with Firearm and Rex later. They were 
the main 
> security officers, and if this Predacon had been wandering freely, 
they were 
> not doing their job.
